title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the EventDrivenSyncOrchestrator platform, including the types of distributed systems it needs to support, the synchronization mechanisms, and the expected performance and scalability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture - EventDrivenSyncOrchestrator
description: Design the overall architecture of the EventDrivenSyncOrchestrator platform, including the components, their interactions, data flow, and scalability considerations. The design should adhere to principles of maintainability, modularity, and performance optimizations. Additionally, provide edge case scenarios, error handling mechanisms, and discuss potential security implications.

title: Design Event Processing Pipeline
description: Design the event processing pipeline, including event ingestion, filtering, transformation, and routing to the appropriate synchronization mechanisms.

title: Design Synchronization Mechanisms
description: Design the synchronization mechanisms for different types of distributed systems, such as databases, message queues, and file systems.

title: Design Monitoring and Logging
description: Design the monitoring and logging components to track the health and performance of the EventDrivenSyncOrchestrator platform and its components.
